full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: My name is MAH Foon Yen, 52 years old, a citizen of the United States. I hold Certificate of citizenship No. IA-36546. I am a U. S. Army WW2 veteran. I was admitted to the United States of America through port of Boston, Massachusetts in 1929. My family and I are residing at 48 W. Dedham St., Boston, Mass. I am presently employed by the Dragon Villa, 275 Mystic Ave., Medford, Mass. MAR Gong Doo aka MAR Doo whose address is now 32 Oxford Street, Boston, Mass. and I have known each other, in China, prior to my migration to the United States of America in 1929; that we are of the same clan; that we, in China, live in the same area and that he and I do our marketing in the Toyshan District 50th Market where we often see each other. I wish to state that in the Fall of 1958 I visited the New York Chinatown to see its annual Double-Ten (October 10th) celebration. On that occasion I visited my fellow clansman apartment at 69 Mott Street. In the clansman apartment that year, 1958, I saw MAR Gong Doo for the first time in the United States. We renewed our acquaintance. From that time on I visits with MAR Gong Doo in New York an average of four to five times yearly. That we also had kept in contact with each other by mail and by telephone. That I wish to state that of all the time I have known MAR Gong Doo/ MAR Doo I have found him a man of good moral character. Yours very truly, male Foon year MAH Foon Yen 48 West Dedham St., Boston, Mass. City of Boston County of Suffolk Commonwealth of Massachusetts who Subscribed and sworn to, before me, this 28th day of March, 1966. GEORGE L. YEE Grayek yee NOTARY PUBLIC 1.7/66 MY COMMISSION EXPIRES NOV. 7, 1970 Notary Public
